mapper.select: select organizer_id, company_refid, user_refid from sportzplatform.organizer o where o.company_refid in (select c.company_id from sportzplatform.company c where c.company_email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) or o.user_refid in (select u.user_id from sportzplatform.user u where u.user_email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select organizer_id, company_refid, user_refid from sportzplatform.organizer
